sentence.Network_en: Haughtiness invites disaster , humility receives benefit.
Finally he came to realize it was his haughtiness that held people off.
sentence.Network_cn: 他终于意识到是他的傲慢态度使人不敢同他接近.

sentence.Network_en: His haughtiness makes it difficult for the masses to approach him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的高傲神气使群众难以接近.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 牛津大学英语词典 ... high-class cookery 高级烹饪术. haughtiness 傲慢; 自大. I've finished my work. 我已经做完工作了. *.
Ciel Phantomhive_互动百科 ... M——Magisterial—— 有权威的 H——Haughtiness—— 傲气（haughtiness） I——Imprison—— 禁锢.
Still I Rise_经典赏析_英文阅读网 ... pumping vt. 泵抽水 haughtiness n. 傲慢， 不逊 thigh n. 大腿， 股.
佛教名称中英文对照_哲学家_新浪博客 ... hatred 瞋 haughtiness 憍 heaven of extensive rewards 广果天.

list.abs: They were displeased with her haughty airs ., 他们讨厌她高傲的派头.
An affected , often haughty pose ; affectation ., 装腔作势做作的且常是傲慢的姿态;
her haughty manners were meant to deceive us into thinking she was an aristocrat .她那趾高气扬的行为是故意要欺骗我们使我们认为她是一个贵族。
Yet he was not a haughty aristocrat ., 但他并非一个高傲的贵族.

means.word_mean: 1. overbearing pride evidenced by a superior manner toward inferiors

auth_sentence.content: He had none of Barak's haughtiness or Benjamin Netanyahu's emotional unease.
auth_sentence.res_content: He had none of Barak's haughtiness or Benjamin Netanyahu's emotional unease.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He had none of Barak's haughtiness or Benjamin Netanyahu's emotional unease.

auth_sentence.content: There was a touch of haughtiness in his spirit, and he took a principled stand on the prerogative.
auth_sentence.res_content: There was a touch of haughtiness in his spirit, and he took a principled stand on the prerogative.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was a touch of haughtiness in his spirit, and he took a principled stand on the prerogative.

auth_sentence.content: Haughtiness and distain for those that are not anoited with a title is not what our society is all about.
